title: The Strength of a Man
description: The Strength of a Man and A Man's Guide to Survivorhood are both researched and written for male survivors of rape, incest, sexual and physical abuse, emotional abuse and domestic violence. The Strength of a Man is a book written to encourage, support, comfort, and inspire male survivors, an often forgotten or ignored group of survivors. A Man's Guide to Survivorhood is the companion workbook filled with insights and exercises specifically aimed at men and the issues that male survivors face.
author: Namid
